name: GHA Composite: Playwright E2E
description: Reusable composite to install browsers and run Playwright tests.

files.template:
name: Playwright E2E
description: Install browsers and run E2E
runs:
  using: composite
  steps:
    - run: npx playwright install --with-deps
      shell: bash
    - run: npm run -s test:e2e || npx playwright test
      shell: bash
